tswitem.name: Signet of Death's Note
tswitem.tooltip:
Signet of Death's Note
Signet (QL 10)
Tradeable
Effect: When you hit a target apply a detrimental effect for 5 seconds which causes them to take an additional 150/300/450 physical damage every time you or anyone else with this signet hits them. This effect can only be applied once every 20 seconds. This Signet can be attached to Head Talismans and Weapons. Combine 10 of these in the Assembly window to receive one Signet of increased power.
